content:
I think I'll create separate notes for each week, and then use tags to categorize my meal plans and lists. That way, I can easily access and review my past meal plans and lists, and also see what I need to buy for the current week. I might also create a separate note for my pantry staples, so I can keep track of what I already have at home and avoid buying duplicates.

Also, I was thinking of using the 50/30/20 rule to allocate my grocery budget. Do you think that's a good idea?
